Consumable.Name: Potion of Restoration
Consumable.Description: A mystical potion that has the power to restore your health and mana.
Consumable.Effects: Restores 30% of health and mana points
Consumable.StoryLineRelevance: Players can purchase this potion from in-game vendors or find it as loot in hidden chests.

Consumable.Name: Rune Stone of Recall
Consumable.Description: An ancient rune stone that can teleport the user to previously visited locations.
Consumable.Effects: Teleports the user to a saved location
Consumable.StoryLineRelevance: These stones are essential for quick navigation around the game world, especially when a hasty retreat is needed.

Consumable.Name: Elixir of Giants
Consumable.Description: A concoction brewed from the blood of ancient giants. Boosts strength dramatically.
Consumable.Effects: Tremendously increases attack power for a short period of time
Consumable.StoryLineRelevance: A valuable item that can be used strategically to tip the scales of a tough battle in the player's favour.
